Posts.Content: Hi ya Anne I'm starting chemo tomorrow so will pop on here to let u know how I go? Worried about it myself but everyone different! Hope I can help with a little info. Till tomorrow :-) Shelley x x x
Posts.Title: Chemo starting next Tuesday

Posts.Content: Hi ya Good for u an don't take any of their excuses! Has my sister pointed out if it was her or my mum I would be in clinic demanding they sort it out ASAP as the stress factor is totally unexceptable!! My little sis damn right I would lol Goodnight catch up with u tomorrow :-) Shelley x x x
Posts.Title: still waitin

Posts.Content: Oh Shawshank How awful leaving u that long! Makes me feel like getting on the phone on ur behalve!! Grrrr Where abouts are u? That's the thing on here u never know weather ladies in uk or another country!! Im sick of having to sit back an let people do their job to do their job to the standard they should! When clearly they don't!! Maybe give the nurses a call on here maybe they could help out in some way! Good luck Shelley x x x
Posts.Title: still waitin

Posts.Content: Hi shawshank I remember this all to well :-( I found my lump on 10th of June went for ultrasound then they did a mammogram, after which they decided to do a biopsy, that was on the 20th I got the dreaded news on the 28th! I told my partner although it felt better to tell someone it didn't change any of the emotions. It's now over 2 months an I can tell u it's been mostly downs but believe it or not there's lots of good days, which I honestly felt I wouldnt have again. I start chemo tomorrow an don't know what to expect? Or how many side effects I will get if any? Give the hospital a ring I doesn't hurt to give them a reminder ur still waiting :-) I hope u get the news ur waiting for! Hugs Shelley x x x
Posts.Title: Hi I'm new here...

Posts.Content: Hi newbies, Can honestly say I don't wanna think what situation I would be in without this site an all the amazing ladies on here!! Wish I could send them all a thank you card an little gift :-) I start chemo on Friday so a few steps ahead of u, all I can say is it does get easier an u do feel like ur back to square one sometimes! Anytime u want to ask question, scream,cry or just feel lonely there's normally someone on here at silly o'clock :-) Take care good luck Shelley x x x
Posts.Title: Hi I'm new here...

Posts.Content: Hi nikkiluz Poor you :-( I'm hoping ur treatment is the same if not better, stay in touch with us though it's horrible place to be but this site is amazing! An I'm sure treatment has come on heaps since before? Just wanted to say hello I start chemo on fri do I'm relatively new to all this but one thing I've learnt we all on the same team :-) Hugs Shelley x x x
Posts.Title: Hi I'm new here...

Posts.Content: Well ladies just thought I'd let u know feel so much better today :-) thought fec was gonna be horrible for me but for some of us just seems like 1st 24 hrs was rough! Seems for others no s/e. Glad it was just for that long I felt so I'll an would advise anyone suffering nausea to call dr out to give u the anti-sickness jab made all the difference!! Let's hope I stay like this feel ok. Hope u all feeling on the up today :-) Love Shelley x x x
Posts.Title: Today a new day :-)

Posts.Content: Hi Abbey Yes dr came out to give me jab although don't suppose any tablets left in me! Couldn't spend another night like that, feeling better now although nausea threatening again so gonna try grab some sleep hopefully will pass! Night night Shelley x x x
Posts.Title: Today a new day :-)

Posts.Content: Hi Nain The bone scan isn't anything to worry about its boring more than anything u have to lay still for about half hr , I had both bone an ct scans promise other than a the dye they were easy compared to other things we have to go through! Hugs Shelley x x x
Posts.Title: Bone and CT scans

Posts.Content: Have a lovely wknd hun :-) Shelley x x x
Posts.Title: Bone and CT scans

Posts.Content: Hi ya I've got lumpectomy an node removal next. Thursday am feeling the same glad to finally be starting my journey, but also nervous about anaesthetic!! Haven't told my youngest 2 children yet, wanted to wait till I really needed to. Just wanted to wish u good luck nice having this site to turn to :-) take care look forward to hearing from u next wk shell x x x
Posts.Title: MX tomorrow and lymph node clearance....

Posts.Content: Hi Sasha rose, I feel exactly the same!! Went out for on fri with some friends an my partner only to find sitting there like I was normal only made me feel worse, I don't know what I expect if anything at all? I Spose the truth of the matter is people are getting on with their normal lives. I'm not getting on with my partner to well either although he tries to be supportive in his own little way but his always been 1 of those that thinks no point worrying over something till u know for sure, or finding the smallest positive in a whole pile of negatives!! But if he was dealing with this awful situation god help us all!! When I finally erupted an ran down the list of negatives an challenged him to try an find me a positive out of that lot he couldn't, felt mean afterwards but it had to be said. I know I'm pushing him away but it's how I feel :-( This whole situation feels so 2 sided u want everyone to enjoy their lives but on the other hand u feel a little bitter that they can go on as normal an try a put on the normal mask when inside ur screaming! I wish I had a solution for us but I don't :-( All I can say sasha is I'm right there with ya :-) Hugs Shelley x x x x
Posts.Title: Had a lovely evening but.......

I wish u all the luck fortune an happiness ur amazing!! Shelley :-) x x x
Posts.Title: Living again

Posts.Content: Hi ya shawshank :-) Glad u finally got u news been thinking of u! About bloody time tummy tuck sounds gr8 :-) Hugs Shelley x x x
Posts.Title: results at last

Posts.Content: CONGRATULATIONS :-) Well done u god u've started me off feel so happy for u I'm normally a toughy becoming abit to emotional for my liking lol Here's to yours mine an everybody's future- its like a wembley wave of emotion pmsl I think I might need some sleep!! Shelley x x x
Posts.Title: Chemo ends - Where's the wine and the tissues?!!!

Posts.Content: Hi Michele I'm the same had lovely long hair decided to cut it short, I had chemo on the 7th so will be following ur progress! I really thought cutting my hair would be very traumatic but after a few tears wasn't that bad hoping I handle losing my hair along the same lines(although I doubt it!!) Shelley x x x
Posts.Title: When can I expect hair loss with FEC

Posts.Content: Hi ya strongwilled that's fantastic news!! :-) I missed out today had my second lot of fec. Glad u had a lovely day
Posts.Title: Macmillan coffee morning - £670.50!!!

Posts.Content: Hi ya Abbey That rings a bell with me the feeling that surely they have made a mistake with my diagnosis! I'm having a picc line none of them look gr8 but I spoke to 2 women at chemo who kindly offered to show me theirs, 1 ladie terrified of needles an really didn't want it but now says it was best decision she'd made. The feeling that comes with it all being so real is 1 of ur down moments but 6 days into chemo I'm starting to feel almost normal again which was a welcome relief thought it was never gonna end!! Will be thinking of u babe :-) hope this helps a bit Shelley x x x
Posts.Title: Worried about having a hickman line...reassurance needed please!

Posts.Content: Hi Abbey :-) U'll be just fine will be thinking of u tomorrow an Friday x Shelley x x x
Posts.Title: Worried about having a hickman line...reassurance needed please!

Posts.Content: Hi Abbey Glad it wasn't as bad as anticipated :-) hope the pain eases ASAP :-) Take care catch up with u tomorrow! Shelley x x x
Posts.Title: Worried about having a hickman line...reassurance needed please!

Posts.Content: Hi Sue thankyou just feel like they should have chased up genetic appointment sooner thats all, As it will have an impact on lumpectomy or mastectomy, My lump is 2 cm an i have an 11mm mass i believe its grade 1. Thanks again :-) x x x
Posts.Title: Confused at the moment!!!

Posts.Content: Thankyou :-) x x x Glad i have found this site already finding it very helpful x x x
Posts.Title: Confused at the moment!!!

Posts.Content: Hello everyone,                             My name is Shelley (35) I was recently diagnosed with breast cancer which as most of you will know is soul destroying at first, All sorts of terrible thoughts go through ur mind. After the initial shock i started to feel ok after about 8 days i thoughtto myself it is what it is i refuse to let this awful situation get the better of me!! But after appointment yesterday to get results of breast MRI feel really let down if im honest :-(  Was told they referred me 3 wks ago to another hospital for genetics as i have quite a few family members from both sides, That have had breast cancer including both my Grandmothers. But unfortunately heard nothing back an will chase it up when they get a chance!! To say i was taken back  a little by their response to this is putting it mildly!! At my first diagnosis i was advised to have removal of my left breast but yesterday said maybe to have lumpectomy an lymphnode removal. Then possibly a mastectomy depending on genetics an results of lymphnodes. Feeling so confused at moment as i'd already excepted the fact that my left breast was gone!! Whatever it takes to get over this right?!! Then was told by Dr an nurse hopefully surgery was going to be within 2-3 wks, After going into sit an recap with bc nurse asked weather she was going to sort out surgery date today? She went on to say unfortunately the lady that deals with making appointments was on training thursday a friday an is'nt in on monday either!! My mum who was with expressed who dissapointment about what she had heard in the last 30 mins, reluctantly leaving, feeling positive it was'nt present in my right breast but like they was'nt looking after me the way they should be!! (Am i over reacting??)   Am now contemplating being refferred to cancer specialist hospital which is further away but that is'nt an issue. Have had another set back today as they fully booked for my surgery till the 28th Aug.  So nearly 6 wks rather than the hopeful 2-3, My Nan also cant understand why my lymphnodes not been checked in any way yet although this was mentioned when i was having my biopsy a month ago!! Sorry to go on i know this is a long rant just feel really insecure about my future if im honest. Many thanks Shelley  x x x
Posts.Title: Confused at the moment!!!

Posts.Content: Lol oh sue pmt!! U are funny have a wonderful wonderful time u deserve it :-) x x x
Posts.Title: Naïve or a dingbat

Posts.Content: Hi ya Lol oh Beevergirl u have def put a smile on my face :-) I did wonder about ur name but hey I'm sure there's a good reason behind all our chosen titles!! I had an awful day yesterday today just feeling sick with worry as I start chemo tomorrow morning but whatever it takes right!! Thank you for the giggle :-) Shelley x x x
Posts.Title: Naïve or a dingbat

Posts.Content: Hi ya Patricia Let's be having ya made me smile :-) So pleased for you hope it goes really well!! It's nice to hear that ur almost over the line with this awful stuff, here's to u pat :-) High fives an all that malarkey lol Shelley x x x
Posts.Title: Docetaxol You B*****D !!!

Posts.Content: Don't u dare go anywhere Sascha this is a open site for all dealing with their own personal battle!! The freedom of choice is doing reading saying what we feel! If people don't wish to read what some of us choose to put up here they don't have to!! Everyone deals with things differently. Ur posts have made me laugh, cry or punch the sky! Don't like it, don't read it simple!!! Hugs Shelley x x x

Posts.Content: Hi ya franoli Can't really offer you any advice I had lumpectomy on 9th aug so different situation, but yes please ask bcn that's what they there for any concerns at all! Better to be safe then sorry have u taken ur temp? Probably nothing :-) Shelley x x x
